page.syntax: V LINE(N XPos1,N YPos1,N XPos2,N YPos2)

argument.name: XPos1
argument.description: The horizontal coordinate of the starting point of the line.

argument.name: YPos1
argument.description: The vertical coordinate of the starting point of the line.

argument.name: XPos2
argument.description: The horizontal coordinate of the starting point of the line.

argument.name: YPos2
argument.description: The vertical coordinate of the starting point of the line.

page.discussion: LINE() draws a line from Starting_Point to Ending_Point.

section.title: Example
section.example: ui_bitmap_create("test",4,4) ui_bitmap_draw("test",<<%code% inner_Rect(0,0,4,4) line(2,1,3,2) line(3,2,1,3) line(1,3,2,1) %code%) ui_dlg_box("","{image=test}")

page.limitations: Used only in the Code sections of UI_BITMAP_DRAW(), UI_SCREEN_DRAW(), and UI_PRINTER_DRAW().
